alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:53AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Carter, Custer, Fallon and Powder River. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strongest winds expected through this evening. Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several inches of snow is forecast for tonight and Wednesday. This snow combined with the strong winds may produce whiteout conditions at times.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris, tree limbs, and downed power lines. Use caution if you must drive. Secure loose objects on your property to avoid damage. Ranchers should take precautions to protect young livestock. Don`t cause a spark!
